mil3.3.11:2.2_1: kocideva puriso visaṁ abhisaṅkharitvā attanā ca piveyya, pare ca pāyeyya,
mil3.3.11:2.2_2: so attanāpi dukkhito bhaveyya, parepi dukkhitā bhaveyyuṁ;
mil3.3.11:2.3_1: idhekacco puggalo akusalaṁ kammaṁ cetanāya cetayitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjeyya.
mil3.3.11:2.4_1: tepi kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
mil3.3.11:3.1_1: kocideva puriso sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitaṁ ekajjhaṁ abhisaṅkharitvā attanā ca piveyya, pare ca pāyeyya, so attanā sukhito bhaveyya, parepi sukhitā bhaveyyuṁ;
mil3.3.11:3.2_1: idhekacco puggalo kusalaṁ kammaṁ cetanāya cetayitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
mil3.3.11:3.3_1: tepi kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
